fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Factional chat, but no factional kill.
- A random adventurer will spawn as the Leader of the Party.
- Typically the adventurers appear as guilty to investigative results but the Leader appears innocent.
- If there are enough players in the Adventuring Party, there must be at least 1 of each of the subalignments.
- There must be at least 1 Adventurer Destructive in a game with an Adventuring Party.
